verilog_input.descripton: input VERILOG file, provide circuit netlist information if it is not included in DEF file

num_bins_x.descripton: number of bins in horizontal direction; computed by internal heuristic if not specified

num_bins_y.descripton: number of bins in vertical direction; computed by internal heuristic if not specified

global_place_stages.descripton: global placement configurations of each stage, a dictionary of {"num_bins_x", "num_bins_y", "iteration", "learning_rate", "learning_rate_decay", "wirelength", "optimizer", "Llambda_density_weight_iteration", "Lsub_iteration"}

scale_factor.descripton: scale factor to avoid numerical overflow; 0.0 means not set

shift_factor.descripton: shift factor to avoid numerical issues when the lower-left origin of rows is not (0, 0);

ignore_net_degree.descripton: ignore net degree larger than some value

gp_noise_ratio.descripton: noise to initial positions for global placement

stop_overflow.descripton: stopping criteria, consider stop when the overflow reaches to a ratio

detailed_place_engine.descripton: external detailed placement engine to be called after placement

detailed_place_command.descripton: commands for external detailed placement engine

RePlAce_ref_hpwl.descripton: reference HPWL used in RePlAce for updating density weight

RePlAce_LOWER_PCOF.descripton: lower bound ratio used in RePlAce for updating density weight

RePlAce_UPPER_PCOF.descripton: upper bound ratio used in RePlAce for updating density weight

gamma.descripton: base coefficient for log-sum-exp and weighted-average wirelength, a relative value to bin size

RePlAce_skip_energy_flag.descripton: whether skip density energy computation for fast mode, may not work with some solvers

random_center_init_flag.descripton: whether perform random initialization around the center for global placement

sort_nets_by_degree.descripton: whether sort nets by degree or not

dump_global_place_solution_flag.descripton: whether dump intermediate global placement solution as a compressed pickle object

dump_legalize_solution_flag.descripton: whether dump intermediate legalization solution as a compressed pickle object

node_area_adjust_overflow.descripton: the overflow where to adjust node area

max_num_area_adjust.descripton: maximum times to adjust node area

adjust_nctugr_area_flag.descripton: whether use NCTUgr congestion map to guide area adjustment

adjust_rudy_area_flag.descripton: whether use RUDY/RISA map to guide area adjustment

adjust_pin_area_flag.descripton: whether use pin utilization map to guide area adjustment

unit_horizontal_capacity.descripton: number of horizontal routing tracks per unit distance

unit_vertical_capacity.descripton: number of vertical routing tracks per unit distance

unit_pin_capacity.descripton: number of pins per unit area

route_opt_adjust_exponent.descripton: exponent to adjust the routing utilization map

deterministic_flag.descripton: whether require run-to-run determinism, may have efficiency overhead
